name: electron-lite
description: this zero-dependency package will download and install the electron (v2.0.16) prebuilt-binary from https://github.com/electron/electron/releases

2015.10.5.description: minimal npm installer for electron with zero npm-dependencies
2015.10.5.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && rm -fr external && npm run-script postinstall && ./external/electron --version || exit $?;

2015.11.1.description: minimal npm installer for electron with zero npm-dependencies
2015.11.1.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && rm -fr external && npm run-script postinstall && ./external/electron --version && node_modules/.bin/utility2 test node test.js

2015.11.2.description: minimal npm installer for electron with zero npm-dependencies
2015.11.2.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: utility2 shRun shReadmeExportPackageJson && rm -fr external && npm run-script postinstall && ./external/electron --version && node_modules/.bin/utility2 test node test.js

2015.12.2.description: minimal npm installer for electron with zero npm-dependencies
2015.12.2.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: export MODE_LINENO=0 && node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && rm -fr external && npm run-script postinstall && ./external/electron --version && node_modules/.bin/utility2 test node test.js

2015.12.4.description: minimal npm installer for electron with zero npm-dependencies

scripts.test: export MODE_LINENO=0 && export NODE_ENV=test && utility2 shRun shReadmeExportFile package.json package.json && rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./external/electron --version && utility2 test node test.js

2016.3.3.description: this package will dynamically download and install electron @ 0.36.12 from https://github.com/atom/electron/releases with zero npm-dependencies
2016.3.3.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: . node_modules/.bin/utility2 && shReadmeExportScripts && cp $(shFileTrimLeft tmp/README.package.json) package.json && rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./cli.js --version && utility2 test node test.js

2016.12.28.description: this zero-dependency package will download and install the electron-browser v1.3.13 from https://github.com/electron/electron/releases
2016.12.28.name: electron-lite

scripts.test: rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./lib.electron.js --version && utility2 test test.js

2017.1.5.description: this zero-dependency package will download and install the electron-v1.3.13 prebuilt-binary from https://github.com/electron/electron/releases
2017.1.5.name: electron-lite

scripts.start: export NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js && export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover test.js
scripts.test: rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./lib.electron.js --version && NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js utility2 test test.js

2017.1.6.description: this zero-dependency package will download and install the electron-v1.3.13 prebuilt-binary from https://github.com/electron/electron/releases
2017.1.6.name: electron-lite

scripts.start: export NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js && export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover test.js
scripts.test: rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./lib.electron.js --version && NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js utility2 test test.js

2017.3.7.description: this zero-dependency package will download and install the electron-v1.4.15 prebuilt-binary from https://github.com/electron/electron/releases
2017.3.7.name: electron-lite

scripts.publish-alias: VERSION=$(npm info $npm_package_name version); for ALIAS in electron_lite; do utility2 shNpmPublishAs . $ALIAS $VERSION; utility2 shNpmTestPublished $ALIAS || exit $?; done
scripts.start: export NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js && export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 start
scripts.test: rm -fr external && npm run postinstall && ./lib.electron.js --version && NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js utility2 test test.js

scripts.test: set -e; rm -fr external; npm run postinstall; ./lib.electron.js --version; export NODE_BINARY=./lib.electron.js; utility2 test test.js
